Description_lang: The caster draws the life force out of the target, slowing their movement speed by $s2% for $d.  In addition, every $t1 sec the caster leeches $357262s1 life from the target and all players within $357262A1 yards of the target.
AuraDescription_lang: $357262s1 health leached from all allies within $357262A1 yards every $t1 sec.Movement speed reduced by $s2%.
